ygData.subject: Re: Erudite Wizard Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: Location of Erud s Crossing Isle: From boat that goes from Qeynos to Erudin it is the stop at halfway point, boat will dock there for a couple of minutes...
ygData.messageBody:
Location of Erud's Crossing Isle:

From boat that goes from Qeynos to Erudin it is the stop at halfway point,
boat will dock there for a couple of minutes...

From boat that goes from Erudin to Qeynos - 1) Ride all the way back around
to get the dock mentioned above but this is a LONG trip.
2) As soon as you zone from Erudin to Erud's Crossing, face off the
right-hand side of the boat (South, I think), jump and swim straight ahead,
you can't miss the Isle, you'll see it on the horizon fairly quickly...

TIPS:
The spiders and wisps do help each other so be careful of attracting
multiples.
Since the wisps help each other, it is best to hit them from afar and take
them down the hill to the beach area out of their normal traveling paths...

Wisps require a magical weapon to melee successfully.
Spiders have nasty poison, don't fight them without group, even then it's
best to have someone who can cure poison
Snakes have much weaker poison
DON'T kill the beetles there, they are protected by the Kerran cats that are
on the island.
Hopefully you can hook up with someone on the island who can 'show you the
ropes' firsthand ))

Good Luck!

Draco

-----Original Message-----
From: Simon Hinshelwood [mailto:iktome@...]

How do I get to this island in Eruds Crossing?Im having real problems
levelling.
Simon (9th level)

> From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>
>
> Hunting grounds for a low-level Erudite Wizard?
>
> 1. Tox Forest (across bridge) hunting Kobolds and Skellies. If you find a
> Ranger to help, you can actually level fast, otherwise you'll be camping
at
> the Kobold camps and fighting for kills, or wandering and hoping to find
> something. Unless they changed the spawn rates since I was there several
> weeks ago, this can be slow compared to other newbie areas.
>
> 2. Kerra Isle. Level 6 is (IMO) about the time you can start venturing
here
> but need a good group to do well. Usually there is a lack of tanks in
this
> area of the world which makes this place more difficult than it should be.
>
> 3. N. Qeynos then Qeynos Hills - I stayed on Odus for a long time before
I
> ventured across the ocean to Antonica. When I finally did, my jaw DROPPED
> at the site of N. Qeynos newbie area. There were kills as far as you
could
> see since it is flat and practically treeless. I was so amazed at how
much
> easier it would have been to level here never having to 'search' for kills
> like Tox Forest. Even with the increased population, the ratio of animals
> was still MUCH higher than Tox.
>
> 4. Erud's Crossing - Once you get over 10, you can start to consider
> stopping at the Isle in Erud's Crossing and hunt Wisps and Spiders. This
> island can be a little dangerous but you can make a TON of money here
> getting Greater Lightstones. This place is definitely Wisp Heaven!! I
made
> a ton of money here in my low teens and have been way ahead of the money
> game ever since. I recommend grouping here like most places. Spiders
have
> nasty poison so beware picking fights. I can give more strategies on this
> place but I'll shut up now ))
>
> Draco - Wizard 20 - Veeshan
>
